oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print of William Wesley Elam and his family
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: William Wesley Elam and his wife, Lydia, and their children. One of the boys standing is John William. The little girl is Sophie. John Wesley ELam is buried in the Fisk Cemetery in Hilham, Overton County. W. W. Elam was a private in Co. F, 8th Tenn. Inf. CSA. This unit was organized at Camp Trousdale of upper Cumberland Plateau men and served most of the war with the Army of Tennessee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Elam, William Wesley; ELam, Lydia; Elam, John William; Elam, Sophie
